title: CORE Capability Tag Definition
description: The formal schema for a single, well-defined capability in the CORE system.

key.description: The unique, canonical identifier for the capability, following the 'domain.action' pattern.

title.description: A short, human-readable title for the capability.

description.description: A clear, one-sentence explanation of what this capability does.

owner.description: The architectural domain that owns and is responsible for this capability.

status.description: The current lifecycle status of the capability.

risk_level.description: The assessed risk of invoking this capability (low, medium, or high).

aliases.description: A list of old or alternative names for this capability to ensure backward compatibility.

policy_refs.description: A list of policy files that govern or relate to this capability.

vector.description: A pre-computed semantic vector representing the meaning of the capability's source code.
